segments.text: I came here to get a chest X-ray .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I will need you to take your clothes off from the waist up and put on the gown , leaving the opening in the back .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I will need you to face this glass plate right over here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Your arms need to be raised to shoulder height .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How come you are walking away ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am not leaving . I just need you to take a really deep breath , hold it , and then let it out .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You will be able to put your clothes on as soon as I have checked the film .
segments.speaker: S2
